content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1174
Where a request for the affixing of seals has been granted, the court may, by order made on the application of any person who was entitled to request the affixing of seals, prohibit any person who is indebted to the succession, the community or the undivided co-ownership for securities, sums or assets, who has custody of them or holds them on behalf of another person, from making restitution, payment or transfer of them.
This prohibition is lifted in the manner and under the conditions provided for in
Section III of this chapter, without prejudice to the remedies provided for in articles 1031 to 1034.
